## Introduction

Pluto TV is a free streaming service that offers a variety of channels and on-demand content. It was founded in 2013 by Tom Ryan, Ilya Pozin, and Nick Grouf in Los Angeles, California. In January 2019, Pluto TV was acquired by ViacomCBS and now has over 28 million monthly active users.

## How It Works

Pluto TV is available on various platforms, including web browsers, mobile apps, smart TVs, and streaming devices such as Amazon Fire TV and Roku. You can simply download the Pluto TV app or visit the website and start watching for free, without creating an account.

Pluto TV offers a grid guide that looks like a traditional TV guide, where users can select from over 250 channels from various genres including news, sports, entertainment, and more. Most channels are curated and include content from well-known networks such as MTV, Comedy Central, and Nickelodeon. There are also on-demand movies and TV shows available on Pluto TV, which are included in the channel lineup.

## Features and Benefits

One of the biggest advantages of Pluto TV is that it is completely free, making it a great option for cord-cutters on a budget. Unlike other free streaming services, Pluto TV does not require any credit card information or personal details to sign up. Another great feature of Pluto TV is its diverse content selection, which is constantly updated with new and exciting channels and on-demand content.

In addition, Pluto TV is ad-supported, which means that there are frequent commercial breaks throughout the content. However, unlike traditional TV, the ads are not as intrusive and do not interrupt the program flow.

## Current Availability

Pluto TV is currently available in the United States, along with select countries in Europe and Latin America. There are plans to expand to other markets in the future, including Australia and Canada.

## Conclusion

Pluto TV is a great option for those who are looking for a free and diverse streaming service. With its access to hundreds of channels and on-demand content, it is a great alternative to expensive cable TV options. While it is ad-supported, the ads are not intrusive and do not detract from the overall viewing experience. If you are looking for a streaming service that offers a great variety of content without breaking the bank, Pluto TV is definitely worth checking out.
